articles.author: Nate Christensen
articles.title: The Chiefs’ 3 biggest questions against the Colts in Week 12 - Arrowhead Pride
articles.description: What are the Kansas City Chiefs’ biggest questions leading into the Week 12 game against the Indianapolis Colts?
articles.content: The Kansas City Chiefs are 5-5 after a second consecutive loss a 22-19 loss to the Denver Broncos and there is no margin for error the rest of the season. Now the focus shifts to the Indianapolis Col… [+4743 chars]
